## Event Loop 

Javascript Asynchronous code  

[Ref:](http://latentflip.com/loupe/?!!!)



```JavaScript
console.log("first")
setTimeout(()=> {
  console.log("One")
},0);
Promise.resolve('Second').then((res)=> console.log(res))

console.log("third")
```
